pages.text: $(p)$(p)$(p)$(p)$(p)$(p)Thank you, Smisle - thank you for choosing to spend your time here with me and for brightening my life every day.

A big thanks to everyone that participated in the Discord alpha:$(li)_MasterEnderman_$(li)Accanthea$(li)ARatfat$(li)Exopandora$(li)Kiako$(li)MineplayerHDYT$(li)Mrthomas20121$(li)Servant$(li)SpeakerHornet$(li)Yuudari
